name: Cloudant
description: #NoSQL #DBaaS for web & mobile apps. We manage app data globally so you can #growMore users, #buildMore features & #sleepMore. For support: support@cloudant.com

apis.name: Cloudant
apis.description: Cloudant is a data solutions provider. Businesses and research institutions can use their data layer to develop their data management operations. It is a scalable platform that supports data-replication, synchronization, analytics, and more. The Cloudant API exposes the database functionality. It is a RESTful API that allows developers to request information from all of the datasets they have access to and returns JSON-formatted data.
